item.description:
The Opera House Players are proud to present CHICAGO!

In roaring twenties Chicago, Roxie Hart, an ambitious chorus girl, murders her lover. She then convinces her gullible husband, Amos, that her lover was in fact a burglar. Amos agrees to take the rap until the police c...onvince him that the burglar was in fact Roxie's lover.... Thus, Roxie goes to jail and joins another famous stage performer and murderess, Velma Kelly. Both Roxie and Velma are headline hunters seeking to capitalize on pre-trial publicity for the sake of acquittal and stage careers with the help of their lawyer, Billy Flynn.

TICKETS on sale January 10 - Call the Box Office at 860-292-6068 to reserve yours or order on-line at www.operahouseplayers.org

Adults $21, Over 60/Under 12 $17

Performances:
Fridays & Saturdays, February 10, 11, 17, 18, 24, 25 at 8pm
Sundays, February 12, 19, 26 at 2pm.

We're going on February 18 at 8:00.  Gloria and Mike and Linda and Ralph have already ordered their tickets.  When you order yours, you can try writing in the notes section that you wish to be seated near the Gloria McAdam party.   Also, when you RSVP, suggest a restaurant where we can have dinner before.  Once we have a decision, I'll post those details, too!
item.name: Chicago! presented by the Opera House Players
